text:
Hi,

I have an API from a workflow from <http://copy.ai|copy.ai> and I want to integrate it in HubSpotâ€™s private app but I am confused as to where am i supposed to add the API? from HubSpot to <http://copy.ai|copy.ai> or the other way?

Hi All,
A quick question.
If I choose to enroll a contact from One workflow to the other one, do I need that this record will (for sure) meet all the 2nd workflow enrollment triggers?
Or, the fact that I "Push" him to the workflow is enough?
Thank you

Hi,
I'm developing an integration that send custom timeline events for companies and contacts.
I would like to trigger a workflow everytime a timeline event is created, the problem is that I can use my custom timeline event for contact in the workflow, but not with company.
Is there any workarround for this?
I precise that I also set a custom date field for both object everytime a custom timeline event is sent
Thank you
<@U050B0DMAE7> Are you sending any timeline events to the company record directly?
yes I send some events directly to the company timeline
Are those activities available when you create a new active List of Companies with that timeline event?
No it's exactly the same problem, I can do it for contact but not for company
right, but if you could create an active list of companies on that timeline event, your workflow could trigger from that list.

Yes I thought about it, but unfortunately it doesn't seems possible
It's really weird that it's possible on contact and not on company :confused:
